name: Panzer Sturm II
description:
Panzer Sturm II, a perfectly balanced tank strategy game, is developed by the original team of Panzer Sturm with 4 years efforts. Various well-known tanks for you to choose from. The combination of sea, air and land forces helps you sweep enemies.

Manage base and unlock the most powerful tanks. Make strategic decisions in the way you want your base develop. Create your legion and defend the honor of it with members. The vast world is open to be explored. Mine resources and clear pirates, rebels and terrorists on the world map to enforce justice. Come and play Panzer Sturm II, the destiny of your legion depends on you.

Features:
Highly polished interface with stunning retina graphics
Various explosive battle modes, including single, legion, city and country
Coordination of Sea, Air and Land forces
Collect 110+ iconic tanks around the world for you
Unlock and deploy tanks depending on your strategy, and send the most powerful beasts to
sweep enemies
Deep tank upgrade system, customize tanks with parts you want
Well-designed tank upgrade system for you to upgrade and arm tanks at your will
Occupy and defend cities with legion members
Launch attack to occupy cities on the world map with legion members and fight back all invaders. Achieve the goal of world hegemony

Unite commanders from all over the world and build your own tank empire! The future is in your hands, download the best war strategy game for free now!
